vainglory.question: Am I more focused on earning human admiration through my social media presence, online activities, and community engagements than pleasing God?
vainglory.description: Vainglory corrupts our good actions by doing them for human acclaim rather than for God's glory, making us slaves to others' opinions rather than true servants of God.

extracted_data_phrases: especially in situations where I had influence over others
ambition.question: Did I allow my desire for power and dominance to guide my decisions, especially in situations where I had influence over others?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: in pursuit of personal goals and ambitions
ambition.question: Did your desire for power and dominance influence how you treated others in pursuit of personal goals and ambitions?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

ambition.question: Did your desire for power and dominance influence your approach to leadership and decision-making, leading you to prioritize self-exaltation over humble service?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: in unjust and cruel exercises of power , authority , or influence over others
of power , authority , or influence over others
through my words , actions , or behaviors
oppression.question: Did I engage in unjust and cruel exercises of power, authority, or influence over others through my words, actions, or behaviors?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by exerting unjust power over them , treating them with disrespect through my words or actions
oppression.question: Did I mistreat others by exerting unjust power over them, treating them with disrespect through my words or actions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take things for granted, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the accomplishments in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envious of others' accomplishments and secretly wished they would experience difficulties?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others with vulgar or inappropriate language
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking to others with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with hurtful language, violating their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when using words that dishonored others, reflecting incontinence by speaking unbecoming language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, neglecting your self-care and self-discipline?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and neglecting the virtue of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Do I have excessive and wasteful gambling habits that take precedence over my financial obligations, family needs, or other responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs or faults through casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs or faults through casual conversations, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained myself at others' expense by sharing their private affairs, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I engage in labor on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did I spend time on Sunday doing something that could have been avoided, thus failing to rest and worship as is befitting of a holy day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
